functions.tag: {CustomModelData:11,EntityTag:{Tags:[Sign,Birch],Silent:1b,Size:0b,DeathLootTable:"item:item/magma_cube_spawn_egg/sign/upgrade_white",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,tag:{Data:{Text1:'{"translate":"白          材","color":"white","bold":true}',Text3:'{"translate":"強          化","color":"white","bold":true}',Text4:'{"text":"⑪","font":"sign","color":"white","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"function item:sign/click/upgrade_white"}}}'}}},{},{},{}]},display:{Name:'{"translate":"白材強化の印板","color":"#FFFFFF","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"設置してクリックすると","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"けっこうな範囲の%1$s置き換える。","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"以下のブロックを","color":"#D1D1D1"}]}','{"translate":"%1$s → %2$s → %3$s","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"白色の羊毛","color":"#D1D1D1"},{"translate":"雪ブロック","color":"#D1D1D1"},{"translate":"クォーツブロック","color":"#D1D1D1"}]}','{"translate":"【注意】スポナーには直接設置できません！","color":"#FF0000","bold":true,"italic":false}']}}
